trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Washington
There were 3 other sightings in Washington on or around January 20th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsWe recorded the ingural address from the C.B.S. station and when President Bush leaves the capital there is an object in the sky behind him. Then the camera switches shots and a few secounds right before he goes behind a sigh a Black streak flys behind the helicopter. When you pause it and go frame by frame it is a solid object, black and pointed a few secounds later it dissapears. The whole time Katie Couric is taling along with a male reporter
Summary: Black cigar shape flew behind President Bush's helicopter.
